Okay, but remember, that base was a decoy, the real one is underground,
Dracona made that one to fool everyone, so no saying that she built a base
really fast from scratch. Okay, so now that this is cleared up, and now you
know why I was confused, let'ss just get back to the RPG, i'm anxious to get
on with my secret storylines...
----- Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>

Sent: Friday, June 09, 2000 12:15 AM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> (Code, in my profile, for Oblitertron, I make it clear that Oblitertron is

big
